name: Michel Moore
description:
I would like to ask you out on a date…maybe a movie, the theatre or dancing…but don’t you think we need to talk first?
I am looking for a very special friend. Someone whom I can call or text the last thing before I go to sleep and the first thing in the morning. Someone who will share their day with me over coffee or a glass of wine. I’m looking for someone to enjoy special times and good conversation with. I’m really looking for a long term relationship but for right now I’m looking for a good friend that will end in a long life relationship
I enjoy shopping, fine dining, dancing, the theatre and movies on the big screen. I love to travel. I also enjoy some time in the gym.
